attributes.action: keep open Tame Valley Primary School, Brinnington, Stockport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and all the other parents of pupils at Tame Valley Primary School, Stockport, have been given 4 months notice that the school will be closed. This leaves only one primary school for the whole of the Upper Brinnington estate. This goes against government guidelines stating that a choice of schools should be available.
